english.segment1: we're worlds apart. the distance between us is just too great. draw me close. let me know You're near
english.segment2: the reason we sing is to bring down Your glory. show us your face
english.segment3: (chorus). pour your love down. and cover me. pour your love down. and cover me
english.segment4: at Your feet I bow down and know that You are my King (my King). the weight of life gets swept away
english.segment5: the reason we sing is to bring down Your glory. show us Your face. show us Your face
english.segment7: in this moment I feel so along. when You pour Your love down. pour Your love down and cover me
english.segment9: cover me with Your love. pour Your love down and cover me
